title: Needing to upgrade your ticket or select a different seat for a more comfortable flight.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Hello, welcome to our check-in counter. May I see your ticket please? I can help you upgrade your ticket or select a different seat for a more comfortable flight, if you wish.
turns.user_response_option_en: Can you suggest some more comfortable seats for my 14-hour flight?
